greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n)= least k such that n^k*(n^k-1)-1 is prime with n > 1.
mathematica: f[n_] := Block[{k = 1, c}, While[c = n^k; ! PrimeQ[c*(c - 1) - 1], k++ ]; Return[k]; ]; Table[f[n], {n, 2, 72}] (* _Ray Chandler_, Jan 27 2005 *)
program: (PARI) a(n) = {my(k=1); while (!ispseudoprime(n^k*(n^k-1)-1), k++); k;} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Sep 16 2019
results.author: _Pierre CAMI_, Jan 24 2005
